# North Roundhead Reconstruction at Canso Canal, Nova Scotia

**Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** WS3736868965-Doc3764655579
**Solicitation Number:** WS3736868965
**Publication Date:** November 25, 2022
**Closing Date:** December 13, 2022, at 14:00 EST
**Status:** Expiring

**Procurement Category:** Construction Services**
**Untservice Code (UNSPSC):**

* 30121704 - Concrete slab
* 72100000 - Building and facility maintenance and repair services
* 72140000 - Heavy construction services
* 72152700 - Concrete installation and repair services

**Summary of Requirements**

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites tenders for the North Roundhead Reconstruction project at Canso Canal, Nova Scotia. The scope of work will be managed under a contract lasting at least 12 weeks.

## Scope of Work

* Excavation and construction of a concrete slab on grade, with associated bedding and backfill work
* Concrete repairs to the north roundhead wall, excluding excavation, removal, supply, placement, and finishing works
* Concrete crack repair

## Tender Details

* Estimated value: CAD 500,001 to 1,000,000
* Bid security is a mandatory requirement
* Tender submissions will be received on December 13, 2022, at 1400 hours EST
* Late submissions will be deemed non-conformant

## Contact Information

Potential suppliers interested in this tender should contact:

Alexandria Dwyer, PSPC/SPAC
Email: [alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

The Government of Canada intends to use competitive and selective tendering, with the lowest price being the selection criterion.

The contract will be awarded under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

No trade agreements restrict this project.

The Roundhead reconstruction project takes place in Nova Scotia. Logistics and shipping requirements will be addressed in the contract award details.
